VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Aethelgard City Waste Services relative to Zenith Metropolis Waste Management?
SRP.A: Aethelgard City Waste Services is {above} Zenith Metropolis Waste Management in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total waste recycled?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Zenith Metropolis Waste Management}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total waste recycled?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Borealis Township Cleanup}.

VE.A: Borealis Township Cleanup's waste recycled in 1994 is {41527.92} tons.

VE.A: Aethelgard City Waste Services's waste recycled in 1995 is {59824.15} tons.

VE.Q: What is Aethelgard City Waste Services's Waste Recycled in 1996?
VE.A: Aethelgard City Waste Services's waste recycled in 1996 is {59494.13} tons.

VE.Q: What are the waste recycled of Zenith Metropolis Waste Management, Aethelgard City Waste Services, and Silverhaven District Recycling in 1992?
VE.A: Zenith Metropolis Waste Management's waste recycled is {53001.74} tons, Aethelgard City Waste Services's waste recycled is {46710.09} tons, Silverhaven District Recycling's waste recycled is {48063.93} tons.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Waste Recycled in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum waste recycled is {16110.42} tons.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Waste Recycled level recorded for Aethelgard City Waste Services?

SC.Q: What is the average total Waste Recycled?
SC.A: The average total waste recycled is {235651.43} tons.

NC.Q: Between 1998 and 2001, did the total Waste Recycled experience a larger or smaller change than between 1997 and 2003?
NC.A: The change in total waste recycled between 1998 and 2001 was {smaller} than between 1997 and 2003.

NC.Q: Between 1997 and 2003, did the total Waste Recycled experience a larger or smaller change than between 1995 and 2001?
NC.A: The change in total waste recycled between 1997 and 2003 was {larger} than between 1995 and 2001.

NC.Q: Between 1994 and 2001, did the total Waste Recycled experience a larger or smaller change than between 1993 and 1995?
NC.A: The change in total waste recycled between 1994 and 2001 was {larger} than between 1993 and 1995.

NC.Q: Between 1993 and 1994, was the average total Waste Recycled higher or lower than between 1999 and 2001?
NC.A: The average total waste recycled between 1993 and 1994 was {lower} than between 1999 and 2001.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Zenith Metropolis Waste Management} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Borealis Township Cleanup, Silverhaven District Recycling, Aethelgard City Waste Services, Zenith Metropolis Waste Management}.
